title: Dress
description: dark blue dress with predominantly red geometric embroidery, among other colored embroidery; embroidered designs are located along sides of dress, at chest, and at sleeve cuffs; neck opening is circular, bordered in black, and has a vertical slit in front; white button located at front of neck opening; bottom of dress is hemmed and has a black inner lining; sleeves extend straight out from shoulder
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
